title: LF keen players for the clash to play all days S5
body:
only requirement is that your available to play all 3 days of the tournament and ready to accept invitation and lock in on time!
it would be cool if you where High bronze to mid silver rank.

LF a competent ADC, MID & TOP - if u main a role other then these tell me as I'm flexible ;)
Add me IGN:  yellowninja

replies.body:
Hi, I'm currently a S3 sup main but can also play adc. I can play all 3 days. Add me in game if interested. 

IGN: Gnesh
